Trade/Device Name(s): MTM301 Blood Glucose and Ketone Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): MTM301 Blood Glucose and Ketone Meter
Methodologies: Enzyme-based biosensing (Glucose Oxidase for glucose, β-hydroxybutyrate dehydrogenase for ketone)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MTM301 Blood Glucose and Ketone Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of blood glucose and ketone using electrochemical biosensor technology
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing to quantitatively measure blood glucose or blood ketone in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip by people with diabetes mellitus at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
